name: face painter 1.0.0 [interactive] {genesis}
description: genesis drop of @lenzfliker ―――✺――― all 69 *initial* wallets of 'face painter 1.0.0' will receive one of 'face painter 1.1.0 (69 editions)' for free ―――✽――― face painter controls: onscreen :: click on [ ^ ] to open control panel || keyboard (click on artwork first) :: 'A/a' key -> 🙂, 'S/s' key -> 😏, 'D/d' key -> 😶, 'Q/q' key -> 🙁, 'W/w' key -> 😐, 'E/e' key -> 😮, 'ctrl' key-> clear canvas, '[/{' key -> decrease brush spacing, ']/}' key -> increase brush spacing, hodl 'shift' key -> trippy faces ―――✿――― thank yoUwU!
